description.en-US: This extension enhances your browser with additional features. With a free maps tool on your browser, easily find directions & the best route suggestions to your destination! The Maps Assist & Custom Web Search extension resets your default search engine and provides you with Yahoo® search that allows you to find images, videos, news, and relevant results. Please share your valuable input with us so we can further improve this extension. You can uninstall the extension at any time. Your add-on is using Yahoo® as a search provider. By clicking the button above, I agree to install this extension and abide by the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service of Maps Assist & Custom Web Search. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Our Privacy Policy: mapsassist.com is a product offered by Innover Group. We provide users with ease of access to information and widgets from their browser. Our Privacy Policy is important for us to continue providing the users with the best possible all-around experience. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address and geolocation derived therefrom : We collect your IP address and the geolocation derived from it when you use the maps tool offered by our extension. We anonymize your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this information for analytics and reporting purposes and to offer the functionalities of the add-on. You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2. Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name and user agent) is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We collect the direction requests that you provide, while using the maps feature of the add-on, to return relevant results. We may also collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. Privacy Policy: https://mapsassist.com/mapsfinder/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://mapsassist.com/mapsfinder/termsofservice_ff.html

summary.en-US: Install the Maps Assist & Custom Web Search extension to get directions by clicking the favicon on the toolbar & enjoy Yahoo® search from your browser.
